A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not only did this movie ignore and crap on the character development\, lore and plot devices of the six first films... It managed to do the same with the first film of its own trilogy..  Horrible plot\, directing and editing has made this dumpster fire of a film not only the worst star wars movie ever\, it's not even a good science fiction movie...   Disney may have actually killed Star Wars...
